name: SlapFest! (BrianMPZ)
description:
SlapFest!

SlapFest is a game of spamming, reaction time, and a lot of slapping.

How To Play

- Player One and Two take turns slapping each other.

- Spamming Phase. During the countdown, press SPACE as fast as possible to try and reach the golden sweet spot on the vertical sliding bar.

- Timing Phase. Time your slap to the horizontal sliding bar to increase your damage output.

- At the end of each round,  the Player that dealt the most damage will gain a point

- The Winner is the one with the most points OR the one that gets a knockout

Score System

- Every round you will be given a score out of 1024:

  •  Perfect - Get a score above 750       
  • Great - Get a score above 500                
  • Good - Get a score above 400                    
  • OK - Get a score above 300                              
  • Bad- Get a score above 200                           
  • Terrible- Get a score below 200        

Play on NewGrounds : https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/872439

*The game may take a minute or two on first load!*
